name: Oscilla
description: Oscilla is a highly advanced oscilloscope-themed robot belonging to the prestigious WebtrES club. Its body design is characterized by a box-shaped structure resembling a soldier, with arms and legs resembling that of a cat. The screen, however, features a unique snake pattern, adding a touch of visual interest to its appearance. Oscilla possesses impressive ability scores in various aspects, making it a formidable member of the club.
